steps.name: Three Foot Looks
steps.directions: pivot your head blah blah blah

steps.name: Run while Shaking Head
steps.directions: swaying your head side to side, run up a couple of steps until you hear a drum beat, where you then launch your head up

steps.name: Three Steps Back
steps.directions: Take three steps back, once per beat

steps.name: Three Swooping Bows
steps.directions: Starting on left side, swing your head down behind you, and bring it back to the front with a snap, then dropping it down to your shoulder level. Repeat 3 times.

steps.name: 5 Foot Stomp
steps.directions: stomp your feet 5 times blah blah
